periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. South wind 17 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 80. South southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 10pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 59 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 67. East wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 54. Northeast wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 68. East northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 58. South southeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 65. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 44. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 52. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 34. North northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 53. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 33. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 59. West wind 3 to 7 mph.
